document.full_text: nato-led forces in afghanistan said on tuesday they had killed a senior al qaeda leader and the second most wanted insurgent in the country in an airstrike in eastern kunar province, bordering pakistan, ending a near four-year manhunt.
document.title: senior qaeda leader in afghanistan killed: nato
lines_and_colors: nato-led forces in afghanistan said on tuesday they had killed a senior al qaeda leader and the second most wanted insurgent in the country in an airstrike in eastern kunar province, bordering pakistan, ending a near four-year manhunt.
